member.name: T:Aspose.Note.License
member.summary: Provides methods to license the component.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As license = New license License.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic")

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.License.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As license = New license License.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic")

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.License.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Licenses the component.

remarks.p: Tries to find the license in the following locations:
2. The folder that contains the Aspose component assembly.
3. The folder that contains the client's calling assembly.
4. The folder that contains the entry (startup) assembly.
5. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.
Note:On the .NET Compact Framework, tries to find the license only in these locations:
2. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.

member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As License = New License license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic") Can be a full or short file name or name of an embedded resource. Use an empty string to switch to evaluation mode.

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.License.SetLicense(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Licenses the component.
member.param: A stream that contains the license.

remarks.p: Use this method to load a license from a stream.

member.summary: Represents a note document.

member.summary: Loads the note document from the specified file path.
member.param: The file path for the file containing the OneNode document to load.

member.summary: Loads the note document from the specified inStream.
member.param: The inStream containing the OneNote document to load.

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.Document.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the note document to a file.
member.param: The fullname for the file. If a file with the specified full name already exists, the existing file is overwritten.

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.Document.Save(System.String,Aspose.Note.SaveFormat)
member.summary: Saves the note document to a file in the specified format.
member.param: The fullname for the file. If a file with the specified full name already exists, the existing file is overwritten.
The format in which to save the document.

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.Document.Save(System.String,Aspose.Note.Saving.SaveOptions)
member.summary: Saves the note document to a file using the specified save options.
member.param: The fullname for the file. If a file with the specified full name already exists, the existing file is overwritten.
Specifies the options how the document is saved in file.

member.name: P:Aspose.Note.Document.NodeType
member.summary: Gets the node type.

member.name: T:Aspose.Note.Saving.ImageSaveOptions
member.summary: Allows to specify additional options when rendering document pages or shapes to images.

member.name: T:Aspose.Note.Saving.SaveOptions
member.summary: This is an abstract base class for classes that allow the user to specify options when saving a document into a particular format.

member.name: P:Aspose.Note.Saving.SaveOptions.SaveFormat
member.summary: It specifies the format in which the document will be saved if this save options object is used.

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.#ctor(Aspose.Note.SaveFormat)
member.summary: The class protected constructor.

member.name: P:Aspose.Note.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.PageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the first page to save. By default is 0.

member.name: T:Aspose.Note.Saving.PdfSaveOptions
member.summary: Allows to specify additional options when rendering document pages or shapes to PDF.

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.Saving.PdfSaveOptions.#ctor
member.summary: The class protected constructor.

member.name: P:Aspose.Note.Saving.PdfSaveOptions.PageCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of pages to save. By default is System.Int32.MaxValue which means all pages of the document will be rendered.

member.name: P:Aspose.Note.Saving.PdfSaveOptions.PageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the first page to save. By default is 0.

member.name: T:Aspose.Note.SaveFormat
member.summary: Indicates the format in which the document is saved.
